resources.string: Hide all buttons and tell me - what's on the picture?
Hide these buttons. You can only click on the one with flower on it.
Hide these buttons in the right order. How far can you get?
Hide all buttons in the right order. Do you know all numbers?
Hide buttons with the flower. What is their color?
Do you know colors? Find buttons with same colors.
Hide pairs of buttons in the right order.
